TEXT.S: Ameenah Gurib ryax sa tay 17 nqu tay 10, Ameenah Gurib, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1959) mrhuw Mauritus ta' misuw hya' ga Ameenah Gurib, aring ryax tay 5 squ byacing tay 6 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. pinqbaqan nya Ameenah Gurib mqwas biru sa pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy sa Saint Patrice. Ameenah Gurib mqwas biru sa pqwsan biru seneng sa Mah√©bourg Loreto Convent. Ameenah Gurib, kawas tay 1983 tmasuq mqwas biru sa Surrey pqwsan biru krahu. Ameenah Gurib tmasuq mqwas biru sa Exeter . qnxan nya Ameenah Gurib maki tay kawas 1988 msqun ki Anwar Fakim, tehuk misuw qani, maki 2 la'iy. mintzyuwaw nya Ameenah Gurib hiya ga m'sezi.
